original_text: Caleb received Hebron for his family, as Moses had promised him. Caleb had chased out the three clans of Anak who lived there.
korean_text: 그들이 모세가 명령한 대로 헤브론을 갈렙에게 주었더니 그가 거기서 아낙의 세 아들을 쫓아내었고

sentences.original_text: Caleb received Hebron for his family
sentences.korean_translation: 갈렙은 그의 가족을 위해 헤브론을 받았다

sentences.original_text: Caleb had chased out the three clans of Anak
